judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandeeino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: John W. English, with him James R. Jenks, and English, Bowler & Jenks, for appellants.
casebody.head_matter:
Richardson Adoption Case.
Argued October 1, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandeeino, JJ.
John W. English, with him James R. Jenks, and English, Bowler & Jenks, for appellants.
Jeffry A. Schapira, for appellees.
December 4, 1973:
